articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary: The gut microbiome can influence immunotherapy effectiveness in urothelial carcinoma by modulating immune responses and potentially improving treatment outcomes.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
